0010110000110100 1100111010100101 1 -> sum: 1111101011011010, cout: 0

1101111110100000 1001001111011111 0 -> sum: 0111001101111111, cout: 1

0101111101011101 0111101000010000 1 -> sum: 1101100101101110, cout: 0
0001101010011011 1000111011100101 1 -> sum: 1010100110000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
